items.name: func webView(WebView!, decidePolicyForMIMEType: String!, request: URLRequest!, frame: WebFrame!, decisionListener: WebPolicyDecisionListener!)
items.desc: Decides whether to display content with a given MIME type.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, decidePolicyForNavigationAction: [AnyHashable : Any]!, request: URLRequest!, frame: WebFrame!, decisionListener: WebPolicyDecisionListener!)
items.desc: Routes a navigation action internally or to an external viewer.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, decidePolicyForNewWindowAction: [AnyHashable : Any]!, request: URLRequest!, newFrameName: String!, decisionListener: WebPolicyDecisionListener!)
items.desc: Decides whether to allow a targeted navigation event, such as opening a link in a new window.

items.name: func webView(WebView!, unableToImplementPolicyWithError: Error!, frame: WebFrame!)
items.desc: Handles or drops events that were rejected by a policy maker.
